name: JS Release 3.12.0
description: This JavaScript Release brings a few new options to our LoginRadius V2 JavaScript library and a couple of bug fixes, please see below for details.

ADDED.text:
Added the following options to the available commonOptions :
vNextUX
disableResendOTPButton
disableResendOTPButtonDelay

FIXED.text: Passwordless Login With OTP now correctly sends Custom Email Templates.
Social Login via JS now correctly sends Custom Welcome Email Templates.
